text: Driggs is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Driggs family, prominent American Family *Deborah Driggs, model, author, and actress *Edmund H. Driggs, United States Representative from New York *Elsie Driggs, American painter mostly known for her contributions to the Precisionism movement of the 1920s *John F. Driggs, United States Representative from Michigan == See also == * Driggs family
title: Driggs
